title: 2 bedroom, Wood-style plank flooring, Controlled-entry access
posting_body: ['South of Las Vegas, in picturesque Henderson, The Bristol at Sunset is everything you could ever want in an apartment community.', 'With proximity to everything from the nature preserves to the excitement, shopping, and entertainment of nearby casinos – when you live here, your most difficult decision will be how to spend your weekends.', '-Controlled-entry access', '-Wood-style plank flooring', '-Resident social lounge', '-Polished kitchen countertops', '-Worry-free 24-hour onsite maintenance', '-Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:', 'Only a small one-time payment', '-Complimentary Wi-Fi in common areas', '-Two-tone paint scheme Select units', '-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)', '-Package locker with 24/7 access to packages', '-Separate dining area', '-24-hour fitness center with free weights and cardio machines                                                                                         Featured amenity', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Prices Change Daily', 'Flexible Lease Terms']
